name: Pyaxel
tagline: An improvement of Axel download accelerator
body:
### Welcome to PyAxel.

PyAxel is a Download manager powered by Axel download accelerator. it comes with new feature like downloading a list of urls and schedule your downloads and etc. This pages is incomplete now and will be updated by the very first release of it.

Installation
```
$ pip install PyAxel
```
Please report any issue at https://github.com/mehdy/PyAxel/issues
Thank You for visiting :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
